abilities.name: Flower Supplement
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Bellossom is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Knife Leaf
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
